reviews.text: Lovin' this brand new coffee house / cocktail lounge in Italian Village. I think I heard about it on Instagram... Or maybe I walked by. I can't remember but...
This is such a great addition to the Italian Village neighborhood! They have a variety of coffee drinks, alcoholic/non alcoholic drinks, and snacks. So far...
So i recently stumbled across this cafe/ cocktail bar because they are hosting bachelor viewing parties & the place itself is gorgeous. The place is dark...
